messages.message:
Hey team, can we deal with a .eml file that has a .eml file as an attachment? (i.e. recursively expand .eml files and attachements)

A prospect has a situation where .eml files containing a pdf (see screenshot), get forwarded as an email and ingested as a .eml file. Inside AI Hub, I only get one layer deep, I.e. the contents of the .eml file that is loaded in AI Hub. I do not get the .eml attachment inside the file, and its attachment the PDF (see screenshot).

Have we ever seen this before and been able to deal with it?

cc @Piyush @Kaustubh (KD) @Josh Rad
I reckon this is a question for docreader team: @Gaurav Saini
@Hamish it's probably a UI limitation. Platform processes files recursively. Let me confirm and get back.
